betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oRadiation is a thing! 

Ores like Uranium, Thorium, Yellorium will poison you! 

There are tooltips for things that are radioactive!

The nuclear wasteland biome is also radioactive, stay away!

§7§oIf you are experiencing effects like weakness, hunger, poison, it means you have radiation poisoning.

Radiation poisoning can be cured by eating golden carrots, golden apples, enchanted golden apples, and RadAway!
